headline: Charles River Announces Scientific Advisory Board to Drive Alternative Method Innovation and Adoption
summary: WILMINGTON, Mass., October 15, 2025--Charles River announces Scientific Advisory Board, led by Dr. Namandjé N. Bumpus, to support industry adoption of NAMs.
